013package org.apache.juneau.dto.atom;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StringUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.XmlFormat.*;
017
018import java.net.*;
019
020import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.xml.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.*;
023
024/**
025 * Represents an <c>atomCommonAttributes</c> construct in the RFC4287 specification.
026 *
027 * <h5 class='figure'>Schema</h5>
028 * <p class='bschema'>
029 *    atomCommonAttributes =
030 *       attribute xml:base { atomUri }?,
031 *       attribute xml:lang { atomLanguageTag }?,
032 *       undefinedAttribute*
033 * </p>
034 *
035 * <ul class='seealso'>
036 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-dto.jd.Atom">Overview &gt; juneau-dto &gt; Atom</a>
037 *    <li class='jp'><a class="doclink" href="package-summary.html#TOC">package-summary.html</a>
038 * </ul>
039 */
040@FluentSetters
041public abstract class Common {
042
043   private URI base;
044   private String lang;
045
046
047   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
048   // Bean properties
049   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
050
051   /**
052    * Bean property getter:  <property>base</property>.
053    *
054    * <p>
055    * The URI base of this object.
056    *
057    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
058    */
059   @Xml(prefix="xml", format=ATTR)
060   public URI getBase() {
061      return base;
062   }
063
064   /**
065    * Bean property setter:  <property>term</property>.
066    *
067    * <p>
068    * The URI base of this object.
069    *
070    * <p>
071    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
072    * Strings must be valid URIs.
073    *
074    * @param value
075    *    The new value for this property.
076    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
077    * @return This object
078    */
079   @FluentSetter
080   public Common setBase(Object value) {
081      this.base = toURI(value);
082      return this;
083   }
084
085   /**
086    * Bean property getter:  <property>lang</property>.
087    *
088    * <p>
089    * The language of this object.
090    *
091    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
092    */
093   @Xml(prefix="xml", format=ATTR)
094   public String getLang() {
095      return lang;
096   }
097
098   /**
099    * Bean property setter:  <property>lang</property>.
100    *
101    * <p>
102    * The language of this object.
103    *
104    * @param value
105    *    The new value for this property.
106    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
107    * @return This object
108    */
109   @FluentSetter
110   public Common setLang(String value) {
111      this.lang = value;
112      return this;
113   }
114
115   // <FluentSetters>
116
117   // </FluentSetters>
118
119   @Override /* Object */
120   public String toString() {
121      return XmlSerializer.DEFAULT_SQ.toString(this);
122   }
123}
